contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|replay}} '''Replay''' may refer to: {{tocright}} *[[Replay (sports)]], a replayed match in between two sport teams to decide in case of tie or conflict resulting from scoring, officiating, fouling or other factors *[[Instant replay]], in motion pictures and television, a showing again of part of a film. It is widely used in context of filmed sporting activities and often in slow motion to show the action in detail. In serious filmmaking this technique also helps to show the same scene from a different point of view or perspective. See also [[Instant replay (disambiguation)]] *[[Replay attack]], in cryptography, an attack where an adversary interferes with a cryptographic protocol by inserting (a part of) a message that has been sent previously in a protocol run ==Film== *[[Replay (2001 film)|''Replay'' (2001 film)]], a 2001 French drama film *[[Replay (2003 film)|''Replay'' (2003 film)]] aka ''21 Eyes'', a 2003 film starring [[Rebecca Mader]] ==Literature== *[[Replay (novel)|''Replay'' (novel)]], a 1987 science fiction novel by Ken Grimwood *[[Replay (Sharon Creech novel)|''Replay'' (Sharon Creech novel)]], 2005 book by Sharon Creech *[[RE:Play]], a 2006 original English-language manga by Christy Lijewski ==Music== === Albums === *[[Replay (Crosby, Stills & Nash album)|''Replay'' (Crosby, Stills & Nash album)]], a 1980 album by the rock group Crosby, Stills & Nash *[[Replay (Alison Brown album)|''Replay'' (Alison Brown album)]], a 2002 album by American banjoist Alison Brown *[[Replay (Play album)|''Replay'' (Play album)]], a 2003 album by Swedish girl group Play *[[Replay (Iyaz album)|''Replay'' (Iyaz album)]], a 2010 album by British Virgin Island singer Iyaz === Songs === *[[Replay (Iyaz song)|"Replay" (Iyaz song)]], a 2009 song by Iyaz *[[Replay (Mr. Children song)|"Replay" (Mr. Children song)]], a song by Japanese band Mr. Children *[[Replay (EP)|"Replay"]], [[Shinee|SHINee]]'s debut single *"Replay", the eighth track from Millencolin's 1995 album ''[[Life on a Plate]]'' ==Other uses== *Replay pen, the brand name in Europe and Brazil for the Papermate [[Erasermate]] pen *[[REPLAY (software)]], a management system for audiovisual content developed at ETH Zurich *[[Replay Professional]], a hardware sound sampling device used by the atari ST *[[Replay system|Replay subsystem]] of NetBurst architecture microprocessors *[[ReplayTV]], a digital video recorder (DVR) *[[Rush Replay X 3]], a DVD set from Rush *[[Replay (TV sports series)]], a Fox Sports Net series featuring alumni from two sports teams, who replay a notable game from their past {{disambig}}
